name: City Car Drifting
description:
Are you ready to enjoy drift racing on city roads? Show your drifting spirit with your sports car.
Enjoy this drift simulator like a real drifting in popular drifting games. Start your drift race like an Arabian from the starting point in this drifting game. Drive your extreme car on city roads to show your drift car racing skills. You have limited time for drift car . You will really enjoy this game. Download it from App Store today.
